channel.title: Percona XtraDB Cluster on Run production-grade databases easily on Kubernetes
channel.description: Recent content in Percona XtraDB Cluster on Run production-grade databases easily on Kubernetes

item.title: Percona XtraDB Cluster Guide
item.description: New to KubeDB? Please start here. KubeDB - Percona XtraDB Cluster This tutorial will show you how to use KubeDB to provision a Percona XtraDB Cluster. Before You Begin Before proceeding: Read Percona XtraDB Cluster. You need to have a Kubernetes cluster, and the kubectl command-line tool must be configured to communicate with your cluster. If you do not already have a cluster, you can create one by using kind.
